description: This PowerShell command allows users to check the version of the Microsoft WebP Image Extension. By executing 'Get-AppxPackage -Name Microsoft.WebPImageExtension', system administrators can quickly determine if the installed version is 1.0.62681.0 or later, which confirms that the update addressing security concerns has been applied. Itâ€™s a useful method to ensure all systems are up-to-date, especially in enterprise environments.
